name: For All ManKind
description:
For all man kind is the most popular surviving rpg game in 2019. The variety of game mission and goals has become the attracting point to the player. Nevertheless, the UI designn is following the main stream popular trending sillihoutte. The consistancy of  the gameplay will sure give a perfect game experience. This game is for all range of players.

This is an coursework assignment which required to create a game prototype.  Update may be done in future upon request. 

Fell free to leave any comments or suggestion at below.

Instruction to play

i) Download the file.

ii) Open the index.html file with firefox or microsoft edge browser.

iii) Enjoy. 

Follow my patreon to get more 3D assets

https://www.patreon.com/wenqi
